description: Rename the MCP server from 'docs-mcp' to 'coderef-docs' throughout the entire codebase, including Python files, documentation, package configuration, tests, and MCP-specific resources. This involves updating all references, imports, package names, and tool identifiers while maintaining backward compatibility where possible.
goal: Successfully rebrand the MCP server from 'docs-mcp' to 'coderef-docs' to better reflect its integration with coderef functionality, ensuring all tools remain discoverable and functional under the new naming scheme without breaking existing functionality.
requirements: Update all Python module and package names from docs_mcp to coderef_docs
Update server.py with new server name and tool prefixes
Update tool_handlers.py with new naming conventions
Update pyproject.toml with new package name, URLs, and metadata
Update README.md with new server name, installation instructions, and examples
Update CLAUDE.md with new server name and version history
Update all test files and test references to use new naming
Update slash commands (.claude/commands/*.md) to reference new server name
Update global resources to use new mcp__coderef-docs__ prefix
Verify all tools are discoverable with new mcp__coderef-docs__ prefix
Update any hardcoded string references to 'docs-mcp' or 'docs_mcp'
Update git repository references if applicable (origin, remotes)
Ensure all file paths and imports use new naming scheme
Run all tests to verify nothing broke during rename
Verify server starts successfully with new name
Update any workflow or CI/CD configurations if present
out_of_scope: Updating external projects or repositories that reference docs-mcp
Creating detailed migration guides for end users
Breaking changes to tool APIs or function signatures
Modifying core functionality beyond naming changes
Updating historical git commit messages or tags
Renaming the actual git repository (only internal references)
constraints: Must preserve all git history during the rename
All existing tests must pass after the rename
Server must start successfully and discover all tools with new prefix
Cross-platform compatibility must be maintained (Windows, Linux, macOS)
Tool functionality must remain identical (only naming changes)
MCP protocol compliance must be maintained
Python package structure must remain valid
Installation process should work seamlessly with new name
No data loss or corruption of existing coderef working directories
Changes must be atomic where possible to avoid partial state
